title: Stakefast
author: Stakefast
content: Hello Highrollers Â I am advertising for crypto caisnos since 2015 and currently I am searching for 2-3 highrollers to invite.As I have special deals with most crypto casinos, I can offer up to 55% revshare cashback on various sites.Let me know via PM if you are a highroller and interested in a fair revenue cashback.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: Still searching ðŸ‘†I got very exclusive commission rates (40-55%)Hit me up if you gamble a lot and you will get more rakeback (you earn more than if you had invited yourself, which is even forbidden in most casinos)

comments.author: efialtis
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on September 20, 2023, 03:37:38 PMStill searching ðŸ‘†I got very exclusive commission rates (40-55%)Hit me up if you gamble a lot and you will get more rakeback (you earn more than if you had invited yourself, which is even forbidden in most casinos)So is (forbidden) incentivizing by sharing your revenue as an affiliate in most casinos - not trying to be a smartass or a pain, just making sure you are aware of that by having discussed this with the respective aff. programs.  I keep loving your sites, btw!

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on July 24, 2023, 12:30:53 PMLet me know via PM if you are a highroller and interested in a fair revenue cashback.In my opinion, very few people believe that there are people who offer to play big bankrolls, indeed Highroller can only be played by top gamblers, they make deposits in what can be said to be large amounts.As far as I know, gamblers who are known as Highrollers are those who bet professionally and usually they don't trust other people who offer various cashback bonuses and so on, they rarely bet through third parties, so if I think about it OP won't get any Highrollers here.Question:* What casino/crypto name you advertise and where you advertise it.* Why you should invite and look for Highrollers to contact you.* Do you want to advise them/Highrollers to deposit and bet on the bitpr0.com site.I think I'm a little doubtful that the OP found Highroller, outside of who knows maybe yes.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on October 05, 2023, 01:57:16 PMI think I'm a little doubtful that the OP found Highroller, outside of who knows maybe yes.We never know until he confirms it, but it's worth a try he has a review site so he can offer the best casino for both of them to be on good terms, this thread will show up on the internet and if there are high rollers who wants profit sharing this might well be the thread and the guy he is looking for, I think all the other casino reviews has a special offer on their review page but this is the only thread I've seen one is looking for a revenue sharing plan.Anyway good luck to OP in finding a high roller.
